reviews.snippet: 한국인이라면 방문을 추천하지 않습니다... 할랄이 가게명에 있어서 그런지 동아시아쪽이 아닌 외국인이 많이 방문하는 곳으로 보입니다. 직원도 전부 일본인이 아닌듯 했어요. 도쿄 물가 감안하더라도 맛이 있었다면 돈아깝다는 생각은 안했을텐데 그냥 맛이 없어요. 리뷰가 좋아서 왔는데 이런 식당을 많이 안 와본 외국인 관광객 때문인 거 같습니다. 야끼니꾸 가게 일본 여기저기서 가봤는데 여기가 제일 불만족스러웠어요.

extracted_snippet.original: 한국인이라면 방문을 추천하지 않습니다... 할랄이 가게명에 있어서 그런지 동아시아쪽이 아닌 외국인이 많이 방문하는 곳으로 보입니다. 직원도 전부 일본인이 아닌듯 했어요. 도쿄 물가 감안하더라도 맛이 있었다면 돈아깝다는 생각은 안했을텐데 그냥 맛이 없어요. 리뷰가 좋아서 왔는데 이런 식당을 많이 안 와본 외국인 관광객 때문인 거 같습니다. 야끼니꾸 가게 일본 여기저기서 가봤는데 여기가 제일 불만족스러웠어요.
extracted_snippet.translated: If you are Korean, I do not recommend visiting... Since the name of the restaurant has Halal in it, it seems to be visited by many foreigners, not East Asians. It seems like not all of the staff are Japanese either. Considering the price of Tokyo, if the food was good, I wouldn't have thought it was a waste of money, but it just doesn't taste good. I came here because of the good reviews, but I think it's because of foreign tourists who don't visit restaurants like this often. I've been to yakiniku restaurants all over Japan, but this one was the most dissatisfying.

response.snippet:
같은 한국인으로서, 이번 방문이 만족스럽지 못했다는 점에 저희도 매우 안타깝게 생각합니다.
저희는 전 세계 다양한 고객분들을 환영하며, 할랄 인증된 고품질의 와규를 정직한 가격으로 제공하려 노력하고 있습니다. 직원 구성도 여러 국적의 인원으로 이루어져 있지만, 이는 언어 및 문화적으로 다양한 고객분들에게 보다 나은 서비스를 제공하기 위함입니다.
맛이나 서비스 면에서 기대에 못 미쳤다면 진심으로 사과드리며, 고객님의 소중한 피드백을 바탕으로 개선해 나가겠습니다.

extracted_snippet.translated:
As a fellow Korean, we are very sorry that you were not satisfied with your visit.

We welcome customers from all over the world and strive to provide high-quality Halal-certified Wagyu at an honest price. Our staff consists of people of various nationalities, but this is to provide better service to customers who are linguistically and culturally diverse.

If we fell short of your expectations in terms of taste or service, we sincerely apologize and will continue to improve based on your valuable feedback.

reviews.snippet:
I recently visited Halal Wagyu Yakiniku Panga, and it was an amazing experience! The food was incredibly delicious, especially the Wagyu beef – tender, juicy, and full of flavor.

What makes this place even more special is that everything is halal, so it’s perfect for Muslim travelers or anyone looking for high-quality halal Japanese cuisine.

The service was excellent, and the staff were friendly and helpful. The restaurant had a clean and cozy atmosphere, making the whole dining experience enjoyable.

I strongly recommend Halal Wagyu Yakiniku Panga to anyone visiting Tokyo – it’s a must-try!

extracted_snippet.original:

The service was excellent, and the staff were friendly and helpful. The restaurant had a clean and cozy atmosphere, making the whole dining experience enjoyable.

I strongly recommend Halal Wagyu Yakiniku Panga to anyone visiting Tokyo – it’s a must-try!

response.snippet: Thank you for taking the time to share your wonderful experience at Halal Wagyu Yakiniku Panga! We are thrilled to hear you enjoyed our delicious wagyu beef and appreciated our halal offerings. We hope to welcome you back on your next visit to Tokyo!

reviews.snippet:
土曜日の夜、予約なしで来店しましたが待たずに入れました。店員さん達はみんな優しくて、テーブルの間に仕切りがあるので落ち着いて過ごせました。ひとりだったので、盛り合わせのセットと上カルビを注文して満腹になりました。リピートしたいです！

⚠︎ 日本の文化に対応しているのかもしれないですが、ハラール店なのにアルコールを提供しているところが少し気になりました。

extracted_snippet.original:

extracted_snippet.translated:
I came here on a Saturday night without a reservation, but I was able to get in without waiting. The staff were all kind, and there were partitions between the tables, so I was able to relax. I was alone, so I ordered a set platter and the top-grade kalbi, and I was full. I'd like to come back! 

⚠︎ It may be to accommodate Japanese culture, but I was a little concerned that they serve alcohol even though it's a halal restaurant.
